phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
The party headed to the Witches' Forest
to break the curse that Vetto had placed on Asta's arms,
and they found Vanessa in a wretched state.
What the hell are you doing?!
I do not know who you think you are, but get your foot off of her right now!
You must be the brat Vanessa was talking about.
told me she would become my slave and live out the rest of her days here
in exchange for healing your arms.
the party began their battle with the Queen of Witches, and then...
They were much faster than I expected.
New enemies arrived at the Witches' Forest.
The Eye of the Midnight Sun...
Witnessing how powerful the enemy was,
the Queen of Witches healed Asta's arms
and let him protect the forest.
Because of the Queen of Witches's healing magic, Asta's arms were better than ever.
His battle with Fana, who was filled with hatred, began.
I will kill you once and for all.
I will just keep throwing your attacks right back at you!
I will just keep throwing your attacks right back at you.
Come at me as much as you want!
I will just keep throwing your attacks right back at you over and over and over and over!
I guess he is built up a lot of stress
since he could not use his arms.
said to have the highest attack power of the Four Great Spirits.
We are up against a spirit that matches the military power of an entire nation...
Asta's anti-magic sword can slash apart mana itself!
But that old guy, Vetto, was much faster and had better senses.
Watching you makes being scared seem silly.
Why are these flames so powerful?
It is like throwing water on burning rocks.
I am basically just wasting mana.
I hope Asta and the others are okay.
Let us sit down and talk this through.
She is not someone you can just talk to!
What is with all this hate business?
What exactly do you hate so much?
Would you mind telling me why you hate the Clover Kingdom so much?
How are we supposed to understand each other when all we ever do is fight?
What the heck are you doing?!
Your friend also really hated us.
Our golden dreams and our bonds of blood!
And... he was full of despair.
Cannot we just understand each other?
There is something strange about him.
I believe that this will become
a world where our peoples can live side by side as friends.
We will be able to understand each other.
If we combine that with our techniques in creating magical items,
we will be able to make this place even more prosperous and safe.
Let us do our best to live together.
The mana is giving us its blessing.
the one who will bring the elves and humans together.
Only that human knows where we live!
Can you handle all of my hatred?
She is got a third eye, too!
Not only did it get bigger, it is using magic with different attributes?
Come on, give us a break!
Let the flames of my hatred burn you to ashes!
I will just have to bring out my special move!
I just got a great idea!
The wave of hot air was enough to blow me away.
I will not be able to get closer to her alone.
Miz Vanessa, Finral, are you guys all right?
Her insane amount of magic is creating a mana force field.
I am having a hard time manipulating space.
The second I put my magic thread out, it gets burned.
Is this the power of spirits?
It is like a god incarnate.
Water Creation Magic: Sea Dragon's Cradle!
I keep putting out the fires in the forest, but there is no end to it!
I guess I will have to extinguish...
Wh-What the heck is that thing?
L-Looks like I will have to extinguish the source first!
What the heck is that monster?
I am the one who uses water magic, so I have to do this.
I know I can do this!
I can do this, I can do this, I can do this!
You have been damaged goods ever since you were born.
Of course you cannot do it.
The only way you managed to pull off the attack
at the Water Temple is because you let your rage take over.
I cannot do anything about that flame!
Come on, come on, come on!
You can do anything if you have the guts!
You can figure anything out with guts!
You are a bit too loud!
Why are you plugging your ears?
Just as Asta gave me courage...
You do not need to tell me!
I am going to give Asta courage, too!
Right now, I will probably only be able to use Sea Dragon's Roar once.
I am not a failure anymore!
Water Creation Magic: Sea Dragon's Roar!
Noelle's attack managed to subdue the salamander.
Now it is finally time for my special move!
How is she able to use magic besides flame magic?!
And she can use recovery magic, too!
You would not happen to have a brother
with a really pale face and spiky hair, would you?
He is over on the other side of the forest right now!
What are you talking about, Asta?!
I do not know anyone like that!
If I have any siblings, they are Licht and the people of the village!
I will massacre every last one of you!
I cannot get through to her at all!
I will just have to stop her with my special move before she recovers!
What is this special move you keep talking about?
You see, I am going to hold out both swords in front of me
and charge straight through the air at super speed!
How could you possibly do that?!
You always come up with the craziest ideas.
Your friends are there to help you win against a fate you cannot defeat on your own!
will end up being incredibly powerful!
I will not let you kill anyone!
My special move was a complete success!
Come at me as much as you want!
I will just keep throwing your attacks right back at you over and over and over and over!
Come at me with all the narutos you want!
I will just eat all the narutos you throw at me!
Come at me with all the natto you want!
I am natto going to let it get me down!
It is all over my swords!
I would not want to be stabbed by those swords.
Atonement is not a kind of food.
It is when you make up for something bad you did.
